meanings.definition: A person or animal that munches.
meanings.sent1: The little munchers enjoyed their snacks at the picnic.
meanings.sent2: The cows in the field are happy munchers of fresh grass.
meanings.sent3: The munchers at the zoo were so focused on their food, they didn't notice the visitors.
meanings.sent4: The squirrels in the park were expert munchers, quickly devouring their nuts.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the munchers chewing was like a symphony in the forest.

meanings.definition: A machine or device that munches.
meanings.sent1: The factory had large munchers that processed the raw materials.
meanings.sent2: The wood chipper is a powerful muncher that can turn branches into mulch.
meanings.sent3: The munchers in the kitchen were so efficient that they finished the job in no time.
meanings.sent4: The muncher in the recycling plant worked tirelessly to crush the cans.
meanings.sent5: The noise of the muncher echoed through the warehouse as it shredded paper.
